rules_text:
Whenever you attack or cast a multicolored spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Brandy Axel.
If Brandy Axel would be destroyed, remove a +1/+1 counter from her. If you do, instead remove all damage from her and she deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: [i]“Never give up easy. Don't go quietly.”[/i]
